name: Launch Checklist
author: Kanopi Studios

sections.description:
When launching your site there are usually a series of things you do before you “go live” to validate your site is ready to go. This plugin provides an interface for managing that checklist through the WordPress UI.

The plugin integrates with The A11Y Project and will pull a list of current accessibility tests to check against. The way to add those extra items is through the settings page for the plugin. This feature uses the jsdelivr service for fetching the data. You must agree to the jsdelivr terms to use that feature.
sections.faq:
I have an issue, where can I submit it?

Kanopi uses Github for it’s code management for the this plugin, please submit an issue there https://github.com/kanopi/wp-launch-checklist/issues

How can I extended the checklist to included the things specific to my project?

You can modify checklist_items.php to contain the items you need. If you are using Composer to manage your codebase you can also composer-patches to add those extra settings without having to modify the plugin files manually.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Add checklist item requested in #11 for Pantheon HTTPS check.

1.0.3

  • Test against WordPress 6.4
  • Fix #10. Fatal error caused when attempting to save checklist settings with no values checked.

1.0.2

  • Test against WordPress 6.0
  • Add icon
  • Fix #8. Thank you BarryHughes

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: WordPress plugin that allows for creation of interactive site launch checklist items.
